name: Deosurge
description:
Step into the boots of Luna Blood as you experience her last moments on Earth. Avenge the death of your friend Xandra by slaying anyone and everyone involved in her murder! In the afterlife, a mysterious character awaits to reward your brave deeds...

This game is short, about ~5-8 minutes for a playthrough. I created this game for a school portfolio and as such had to work within a small time constraint to create this full game, but I hope you will find it to be an enjoyable ride, albeit short!

Game inspired and influenced by:  Anger Foot and The Grim Stuff. Make sure to play them if you haven't already!

MovementWASDJumpSPACECrouchCTRL / C
ShootM1ReloadRMeleeFHolster / Equip
